examples.example: 我认真地整理了所有的文件，让它们变得井井有条。

translate.english: I carefully sorted out all the files and made them well-organized.

examples.example: 我快速地处理好各种文件，出色地完成了工作任务。

translate.english: I quickly processed various kinds of files and excellently completed the work tasks.

examples.example: 我仔细地阅读每一份文件，从中获取了宝贵的信息。

translate.english: I carefully read every document and obtained valuable information from it.
